Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I'm pretty sure I've found a thread where you can post a link to a thread of you which you'd like to remove or remove a poll attached to it. Sadly, I can't find it now and in the Forum FAQ is only explained how to delete posts. Can somebody help me, or have I seen this anywhere else?

Volcanix

Oh god... I'm so stupid.. I looked through every other sub forum (except international) but not in this.. Thank you so much.. I feel really stupid now^^

Have a great day!
